article.name: Translations
article.description: About my translations and the projects that I have translated

content.value: More and more people can understand english, but it's still a small portion of the hungarian population. Basic tools (like the first project I translated) should be available for anyone, especially if they are as good as Notepads or Files.

content.quote:
egy idezetes cuccot programozok
 es kene valami bullshit amit belerakhatok per pill
content.name: Kristóf Kékesi

content.value: I'm fluently speaking hungarian, my mother language. I'm currently learning english which I started in 2015, and german.

For most of my translations I translate from english to hungarian. I've translated several <abbr class='target' title='' customtitle='Universal Windows Platform'>UWP</abbr> applications, as well as some for Swift projects, but I'm open for other platforms too. If you are in need of a hungarian translator feel free to contact me.

content.value: My first program I translated were Notepads. A modern, lightweight text editor with a minimalist design, by Jiaqi Liu. It's a UWP application for Windows.
